name: Waylander Welding Leather Waist Apron Heat Flame Resistant Heavy Duty Bib Dark Brown (18"x18")
short_description: HIGH QUALITY WELDING LEATHERS: Our welding apron is made with high quality, cowhide split leather and offers great protection against sparks, spatter, heat and slag. We use flame resistant Kevlar stitching for extra strength and protection.

CONVENIENT DESIGN: This apron covers and protect upper legs. Ideal for woodwork, small metalworking or soldering, or any job that needs increased protection of the upper legs. The strap is easy to customize if needed.

PROTECTING MORE THAN WELDERS: While our leather waist apron makes a great gift for men, it can also provide the best protection as a leather blacksmith or metal working apron. Try it as a grilling apron, farrier apron or workshop apron, too.
product_description: The Waylander WA1824 is a premium waist leather apron crafted from top-quality cow skin leather. It safeguards clothing and skin from welding splatter and sparks. The apron features an easily adjustable cotton strap with a buckle at the waist for a perfect fit. Additionally, it's versatile and can be used for various tasks like grilling, gardening, automotive work, metal construction, and more in workshops, shipyards, and other industrial settings.

name: MAGID 180-36 Spark Guard Green Flame Resistant Bib Style Apron, Green, 25x36
product_description: MAGID SparkGuard Flame Resistant Bib Style Apron provides flame resistance even after repeated laundering. This green protective apron features an overedge bib and bottom. The apron has brass grommets, loose string ties, and meets ASTM D6413-99 for flame resistance of textiles. Apron Size: 25in x 36in Clothing Type: Aprons Color: Green Compliance: ASTM D6413 Country of Origin: Philippines - Subject to change Material: Flame Resistant 100% Cotton Pockets: No MAGID is dedicated to providing fire resistant clothing and heat resistant suits that provide superior protection while on the job. With the appropriate safety features and quality comfort, workers can get the job done right without worrying about injury.
